abilities.name: The Tyrant of Badab
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Red Corsairs
abilities.rule: After both players have deployed their armies, you can select up to three **HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY** units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Hamadrya’s Knowledge
abilities.rule: Once per battle, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model’s unit, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".
